Product Grid Section.Layout: Grid-based structure with multiple columns, adjusting from two to four columns based on screen size.
Product Grid Section.Design: Clean and modern design, with a focus on product images and pricing information. Each product is presented in a card-like format with space for images, titles, descriptions, and prices.

Key Elements.Heading: Centered, bold heading with a supporting text paragraph.
Key Elements.Product Cards: Individual product listings with images, titles, brand names, and prices.
Key Elements.Images: High-quality product images with hover effects that slightly enlarge the image.
Key Elements.Pricing: Prominent display of current and original prices, indicating discounts where applicable.
Key Elements.Call-to-Action: Each product card links to a detailed product page.

Product Grid Section.Use Cases: Ideal for e-commerce websites, online retail stores, and marketplaces looking to showcase multiple products in an organized and visually appealing manner.
